if(UNIX)
link_directories("${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/externals/Fmod-2.00.08/linux/api/core/inc/" "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/externals/Fmod-2.00.08/linux/api/studio/inc/")
else()

endif()
